nodes.bodyText: This model is only used for kie. So I think you do not give a properpy direrctory structure to hold different implementations.
You can use "kie".equalsIgnoreCase to make logic simpler.
This code is very complicated, you can use some desgin patterns to make it simpler, such Factory based on valueType.
This code is very long, and seams you process serviceList, versionList, etc with the same code resultMap.putAll(processValueType(kvDoc)); , and the logic can be refactored.
